title: People bitch and moan about Pantheon but don't even bother playing his counters
body:
One of which is none other than Mordekaiser.

He bullies Pantheon harder and out-lasts his mana bar with his Iron Man shield.

Pantheon can't wear him down and if he gets fed up with chucking spears and wants to engage he gets a mace and a full W to the face.

And the best thing.
Morde outscales Pantheon as well.

That isn't healthy game design, although I agree that counterbuilding (while healthier, because it allows you options in game) is almost as unhealthy as counterpicking.

I think you're being a bit biased because your main counters him so it doesn't affect you. Think you need to take a step back and look at the bigger picture. Panth bullies the shit out of the vast majority of top laners with very little effort and unavoidable damage. Also factor in that you don't always get the luxury of counterpicking your lane opponent

If the game was balanced around how a champion specifically fairs against our mains, it would be a pretty poor game. For example, even though Darius completely stomps my main in lane, I've actually defended him on multiple occasions. You gotta look at the champion as a whole as opposed to how it affects you directly
